attributes.additional_details: A nurse checking out someone with Mental Health or Learning difficulties when unqualified and sending false reports back to DWP.Around 60% of them are overturned at the appeal stage.
attributes.background: The amount of wrong assessments have led to thousands of death by these unproffessional 's.To try and stop the likes of atos and other companies doing assessments on people's health by  Personnel not qualified to do so.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
